Actually, Alloran2, Prowl is the same beast mode as the autobot 
decendant toy, but he doesn't have the same background, and wouldn't 
be you char's brother.

::Zardus/DeathStorm/Striker/Prowl/Killer/Annihilator/Zeus::

Zardus lands in the alliance base. He puts Nemesis in a CR chamber 
and climbs into one himself.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm changes his course and heads off toward his ship.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker looks at Rowdy Wolf and the rifle aimed at his head. 
"Predacons are evil and pathetic," He says in responce to Rowdy's 
question, "I am a maximal."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks through some bushes at the battle going on at the new 
ship.

"Do we join in?" He asks Iron Raptor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator stumbles back from Inferno's shot and crashes into 
Killer, who is stumbling back from Rampage's shot. The two dive 
behind boulders and return fire at the preds.
